verses.verse: <S%H3117>"For,<s%> behold, in those days, and in that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> I restore the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%>

I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> all <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and will bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat;<s%> and I will execute <S%H8199>judgment<s%> on them there for my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and for my <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom they have <S%H6340>scattered<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> They have <S%H2505>divided<s%> my <S%H776>land,<s%>

and have <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> a <S%H3206>boy<s%> for a <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> and <S%H4376>sold<s%> a <S%H3207>girl<s%> for <S%H3196>wine,<s%> that they may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

<S%H6865>"Yes,<s%> and what are you to me, Tyre, and <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> and all the <S%H1552>regions<s%> of <S%H6429>Philistia?<s%> <S%H7999>Will<s%> you <S%H1580>repay<s%> <S%H1580>me?<s%> And if you repay <S%H7031>me,<s%> I will swiftly and <S%H4120>speedily<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> your <S%H1576>repayment<s%> on your own <S%H7218>head.<s%>
Because you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> my <S%H3701>silver<s%> and my <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and have <S%H935>carried<s%> my <S%H2896>finest<s%> <S%H4261>treasures<s%> into your <S%H1964>temples,<s%>

and have <S%H4376>sold<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the sons of the <S%H3125>Greeks,<s%> that you may remove them <S%H7368>far<s%> from their <S%H1366>border.<s%>
<S%H5782>Behold,<s%> I will stir them up out of the <S%H4725>place<s%> where you have <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H7725>them,<s%> and will return your <S%H1576>repayment<s%> on your own <S%H7218>head;<s%>

and I will <S%H4376>sell<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and they will <S%H4376>sell<s%> them to the men of <S%H7615>Sheba,<s%> to a <S%H7350>faraway<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>"

<S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> this among the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> <S%H6942>"Prepare<s%> for <S%H4421>war!<s%> Stir <S%H5782>up<s%> the mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%> Let all <S%H582>the<s%> <S%H4421>warriors<s%> draw <S%H5066>near.<s%> Let them come <S%H5927>up.<s%>

<S%H3807>Beat<s%> your <S%H855>plowshares<s%> into <S%H2719>swords,<s%> and your pruning <S%H4211>hooks<s%> into <S%H7420>spears.<s%> Let the <S%H2523>weak<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1368><s%> 'I am strong.'

<S%H5789>Hurry<s%> and <S%H935>come,<s%> all you surrounding <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H5439>gather<s%> yourselves <S%H6908>together.<s%>" Cause your mighty <S%H1368>ones<s%> to come <S%H5181>down<s%> <S%H3068>there,<s%> Yahweh.

"Let the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5782>arouse<s%> <S%H5927>themselves,<s%> and come up to the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat;<s%> for there will I <S%H3427>sit<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> all the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H7971>Put<s%> in the <S%H4038>sickle;<s%> for the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is <S%H1310>ripe.<s%> <S%H935>Come,<s%> <S%H3381>tread,<s%> for the <S%H1660>winepress<s%> is <S%H4390>full,<s%> the <S%H3342>vats<s%> <S%H7783>overflow,<s%> for their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H7227>great.<s%>"

<S%H1995>Multitudes,<s%> <S%H1995>multitudes<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H2742>decision!<s%> For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H2742>decision.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> are <S%H6937>darkened,<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H622>withdraw<s%> their <S%H5051>shining.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7580>roar<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H5414>and<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H7493>shake;<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"So you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%> Then <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will be <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and no <S%H2114>strangers<s%> will pass through her any <S%H5674>more.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> will drop <S%H5197>down<s%> sweet <S%H6071>wine,<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> will <S%H3212>flow<s%> with <S%H2461>milk,<s%> all the <S%H650>brooks<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will <S%H3212>flow<s%> with <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> will come <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and will <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H7851>Shittim.<s%>

<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will be a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and <S%H123>Edom<s%> will be a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> because they have <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in their <S%H776>land.<s%>
But <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
I will <S%H5352>cleanse<s%> their <S%H1818>blood,<s%> that I have not <S%H5352>cleansed:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>"
